channel.title: Comments on: Sharing ASP.net Session State Between Web Applications With SQL Server – Part I

item.title: By: Di

item.description: OMG! This works! Great! Thank you very and very much!
item.content:encoded: OMG! This works! Great! Thank you very and very much!

item.title: By: SEO

item.description: That's great, I never thought about Sharing ASP.net Session State Between Web Applications With SQL Server like that before.<br />

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: Works great! There's a real void of solid answers on this topic -- until now. Thanks for taking the time to put it all together in a concise article.
item.content:encoded: Works great! There’s a real void of solid answers on this topic — until now. Thanks for taking the time to put it all together in a concise article.

item.description: I actually just finished part II, and I'll be uploading the project if you want that. You can tell me all the things I forgot to write down ;)
